verses.verse: A Psalm of David,<WH1732> Maschil.<WH4905> Blessed<WH835> is he whose transgression<WH6588> is forgiven,<WH5375> whose sin<WH2401> is covered.<WH3680>
Blessed <WH835> is the man<WH120> unto whom the LORD<WH3068> imputeth<WH2803> not<WH3808> iniquity,<WH5771> and in whose spirit<WH7307> there is no<WH369> guile.<WH7423>
When <WH3588> I kept silence,<WH2790> my bones<WH6106> waxed old<WH1086> through my roaring<WH7581> all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long.
For <WH3588> day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> thy hand<WH3027> was heavy<WH3513> upon<WH5921> me: my moisture<WH3955> is turned<WH2015> into the drought<WH2725> of summer.<WH7019> Selah.<WH5542>

I acknowledged<WH3045> my sin<WH2403> unto thee, and mine iniquity<WH5771> have I not<WH3808> hid.<WH3680> I said,<WH559> I will confess<WH3034> my transgressions<WH5921> <WH6588> unto the LORD;<WH3068> and thou<WH859> forgavest<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of my sin.<WH2403> Selah.<WH5542>

For <WH5921> this<WH2063> shall every<WH3605> one that is godly<WH2623> pray<WH6419> unto<WH413> thee in a time<WH6256> when thou mayest be found:<WH4672> surely<WH7535> in the floods<WH7858> of great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> they shall not<WH3808> come nigh<WH5060> unto<WH413> him.
Thou <WH859> art my hiding place;<WH5643> thou shalt preserve<WH5341> me from trouble;<WH4480> <WH6862> thou shalt compass me about<WH5437> with songs<WH7438> of deliverance.<WH6405> Selah.<WH5542>
I will instruct<WH7919> thee and teach<WH3384> thee in the way<WH1870> which<WH2098> thou shalt go:<WH1980> I will guide<WH3289> <WH5921> thee with mine eye.<WH5869>

Be <WH1961> ye not<WH408> as the horse,<WH5483> or as the mule,<WH6505> which have no<WH369> understanding:<WH995> whose mouth<WH5716> must be held in<WH1102> with bit<WH4964> and bridle,<WH7448> lest<WH1077> they come near<WH7126> unto thee.<WH413>
Many <WH7227> sorrows<WH4341> shall be to the wicked:<WH7563> but he that trusteth<WH982> in the LORD,<WH3068> mercy<WH2617> shall compass him about.<WH5437>
Be glad<WH8055> in the LORD,<WH3068> and rejoice,<WH1523> ye righteous:<WH6662> and shout for joy,<WH7442> all<WH3605> ye that are upright<WH3477> in heart.<WH3820>
